snippet: Vietnam warned China on Tuesday that it would take all necessary measures to defend its interests in the South China Sea if China did not remove a large oil rig from waters claimed by both countries.
abstract: Vietnam warns China that it will take all necessary measures to defend its interests in the South China Sea if China does not remove large oil rig from waters claimed by both countries; China's choice to station rig in disputed waters is widely seen as one of its most provocative steps in campaign to assert sovereignty.
lead_paragraph: Vietnam warned China on Tuesday that it would take all necessary measures to defend its interests in the South China Sea if China did not remove a large oil rig from waters claimed by both countries.

headline.main: Vietnam: Warning Issued to China Over Oil Rig in Disputed Waters
headline.print_headline: Vietnam: Warning Issued to China Over Oil Rig in Disputed Waters
